channel.title: How to make item cost pkpoints? [pi]

item.title: How to make item cost pkpoints? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

You wanted to find where its located, extremez told you where.

But what I think you meant to ask how to change it + find it.
Go to shopassistant.java and find one of the id’s already in the shop i.e. ags 11694 search it copy the code and edit the id, value of how many there should be in the shop and add it to the list. Compile then run, always keep a back up.

Read full topic
